00013 class EHelix : public IStepNode
00014 {
00015 public: 
00016   CLASSDEF(EHelix);
00017   Ecurve _curve;
00018   Eaxis2_placement_3dPtr position; 
00019   Epositive_length_measurePtr radius; 
00020   Elength_measurePtr pitch; 
00021 
00022 };
00023 EXP_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(EHelix);
00024 
00025 struct Earc : public IStepNode
00026 {
00027 public: 
00028   Ecurve _curve;
00029   CLASSDEF(Earc);
00030   Ecartesian_pointPtr start_point;    /* Arc endpoints */
00031   Ecartesian_pointPtr end_point;
00032   Ecartesian_pointPtr center;           /* Arc center, relative to view */
00033   Eplane_angle_measurePtr radius;           /* Arc radius */
00034   Eplane_angle_measurePtr start_angle;          /* Start angle in radians */
00035   Eplane_angle_measurePtr sweep_angle;          /* Sweep angle in radians */
00036 } ;      
00037 EXP_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(Earc);
